title: inSurance Claim #QmZaPzC - Follow up
body:
[SUMMARY]
GERO tokens were bought with 2 transactions:
1. https://etherscan.io/tx/0x9324f4589e5314a88a5555afc3fd9a75ce754537bc20a87203601ee2dec901c6

[Purchase amount]: $958 for 2,161.49 GERO 
[Current value]: $0.167053*2,161.49=$361.08
[Devaluation]: 62.31% < 95% devaluation requirement. 

2. https://etherscan.io/tx/0x99124a872722786e9d146a3b3a3a19b6fb34653ab31afa116d16ee1a577e1b6b

[Purchase amount]: $2270 for 5,152.6069 GERO
[Current value]:  $0.167053*5,152.6069=$860.758
[Devaluation]: 62.08% < 95% devaluation requirement. 

The % calculation can be checked by using this tool: https://percentagecalculator.net/

[RESOLUTION]: GERO funds owned by the member have not devaluated more than 95%. (Claim did not meet the minimal requirement)
A new insurance claim will need to be filed if the funds will lose 95% of the purchase price.
author: 0x4a30e80E9111CDacE350Fa72D011967ba9514b6B
